solution_line_template: Each bus can accommodate {rows_per_bus} x {columns_per_bus} = <<{rows_per_bus}*{columns_per_bus}={students_per_bus}>>{students_per_bus} students.
Therefore, {students_per_bus} x {num_buses} = <<{students_per_bus}*{num_buses}={total_students}>>{total_students} students can be accommodated by the six busses.
